alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 1:33PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Camden and southwestern Glynn Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 133 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Woodbine, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Kingsland, Woodbine, Waverly, Tarboro and Colesburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Camden; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn
